Articles.Content:
Hello.

I've been playing KSP for quite some time now and took brief looks over the forum here but never really stuck from minor peeking.

Just wanted to say hi and hope to see new friendly faces around here and learn more about this marvelous game.

(I still have issues of effectively getting into orbit and onto other extraterrestrial bodies. But I'm getting there)

PS. I love the emotes
Welcome. Enjoy your stay. Feel free to ask. And remember to play the game on your own style.
Welcome Good luck with your space endeavours... the community is really nice so I hope you're gonna have a nice stay
Hello from the Bay of Plenty! Another person in this country playing KSP!? Unheard of! XD

Welcome to the Forum!

That efficiently-getting-into-orbit thing is also something that I still need to learn. I hope I'll figure it out soon xD

To cover up some questions I would recommend reading the Forum FAQ. It prevented me from posting threads about stupid questions.. except for one. Urgh, never mind.

Have fun on the Forum!

...It prevented me from posting threads about stupid questions

Hehe, my first post was "What's a flag?" - the only stupid question is the one you don't ask. (Come to think of it, I haven't seen flags explained anywhere except in answer to that question.)
